name: The Facility-beta
description:
The Facility-beta
Made by Samy

The Facility is a small horror experience made with the Unreal Engine 4.27. The Facility is supposed to be similar to Amnesia and Outlast.

This game gives you a small enjoyable horror experience of an old breached facility which has turned into a habitable zone for the entities.  such as disgusting humanoid creatures lurking in the darkness of the breached facility.

(Game is still in beta so don't have high hopes.)
